full_summary:
Resetting Application ID: **cb-551-45180862** for Real-time PCR System
===============

The Government of Canada, represented by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the purchase of one (1) Real-time PCR System.

**Business Opportunity Information**

* Amended Proposals Due Date: **2024-02-02**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2024-01-09**
* Expected Contract End Date: **2024-03-29**
* Regions of Opportunity: **Canada**
* Regions of Delivery: **Fredericton**

**Purchase and Delivery Details**

The successful supplier will be required to deliver one (1) Real-time PCR System to the Fredericton Research and Development Center, as per the tender specifications.

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria**

The procurement process is open to suppliers who have the necessary expertise and resources to meet the requirements outlined in the tender document. The selection criteria is based on the lowest price, following the terms and conditions outlined in the procurement method (Competitive - Selective Tendering).

**Contratant Contact Information**

Rachael Johnston
Email: [rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca](mailto:rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca)

**Trade Agreements**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Other Applicable Trade Agreements

**Notice Document**

Download the full notice document at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/28160/npp\_2.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/28160/npp\_2.pdf)

This entry has been created in a concise and clear format, consistent with government regulations. The attached notice document contains the complete specifications and requirements for the tender proposal. Qualified suppliers are invited to submit their proposals according to the guidelines outlined in the attached notice. [END OF DOCUMENT]
